snippet.title: Battlefield 3: Operation Metro Multiplayer Gameplay Trailer (E3)
snippet.description: The first multiplayer footage from Battlefield 3 is here! Played in Rush mode on the E3 map "Operation Métro", this trailer shows actual gameplay between the U.S. Marine Corps and Russian Spetsnaz forces in and around the centre of Paris.
